trans-unit.source: Provides a glyph for an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to display when a user has not performed required designer actions at design time.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um glifo para um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> a ser exibido quando um usuário não executou as ações de designer necessárias em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Activity designers use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConfigErrorGlyph> to display actions associated with smart tags on the designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Usam designers de atividade <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConfigErrorGlyph> para exibir as ações associadas a marcas inteligentes na superfície do designer.

trans-unit.source: For example, if an activity requires users to set a property, the activity designer displays <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConfigErrorGlyph> to help notify them that they are required to set the property.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se uma atividade exige que os usuários definir uma propriedade, o designer de atividade exibe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConfigErrorGlyph> para notificá-lo de que eles são necessários para definir a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConfigErrorGlyph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConfigErrorGlyph" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConfigErrorGlyph" /> can gain focus on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> with which it is associated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConfigErrorGlyph" /> pode adquirir foco no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> ao qual ele está associado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer glyph can be activated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o glifo designer pode ser ativado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> with which the glyph is associated.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> ao qual o glifo é associado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate whether the glyph appears on the activity designer surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar se o glifo aparece na superfície do designer de atividade; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds for the glyph on the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna os limites para o glifo no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds for the glyph.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites do glifo.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="designer" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="designer" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> on which the glyph is drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> no qual o glifo é desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the glyph that an action has been performed which has activated the glyph.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o glifo de que uma ação foi executada que ativou o glifo.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConfigErrorGlyph.OnActivate%2A> is called, the designer verbs associated with the glyph are displayed on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConfigErrorGlyph.OnActivate%2A> é chamado, o designer associados com o símbolo de verbos são exibidos na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to perform fill and drawing tasks.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> para executar tarefas de preenchimento e de desenho.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the glyph appears on the design surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que o glifo aparece na superfície de design; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> to use to access ambient property settings.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> a ser usado para acessar configurações de propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> from which to obtain information about user actions.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> do qual obter informações sobre ações do usuário.

trans-unit.source: Performs any tasks required to render the glyph on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas necessárias para renderizar o glifo na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the priority setting for the glyph on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a configuração de prioridade do glifo na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the priority setting for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConfigErrorGlyph" /> on the activity design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que representa a configuração de prioridade para a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConfigErrorGlyph" /> na superfície de design de atividade.
